meanings: the withdrawal of notes in circulation

vlive.korean: [땡 회수] 땡! [Taking it back] Wrong! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.91

[말은 상냥하게 하지만 소품 회수에는 거침없는 편] - 여기다가 하자 - 안 돼! - 안 돼! [He may sound kind but he's merciless when taking props] - We can put this here. - No! - No! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 이 순간을 ❄️FREEZE❄️ 하고 싶은 투바투의 꾸미 트리기 시간🎄💕 (TXT drawing Christmas trees&making Christmas trees)
vlive.english: [He may sound kind but he's merciless when taking props] - We can put this here. - No! - No!

vlive.korean: 앨범 회수하겠습니다. I'll take your albums. 듣기 View video BTS : [FULL] BTS Comeback Preview show <방탄늬우스 in LA>
[긴급 회수] - 안 돼요 - 지금 먹으면 안 돼요? [Taking pills back] - Not now. - Why not? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 ep81_부회장님 특단의 조치! 조아제약 날개의 등장?
vlive.english: [Taking pills back] - Not now. - Why not?

vlive.korean: 생각해보면 하루에 머리 빗는 회수가 많지 않습니다. You don't usually brush your hair often in a day. 듣기 View video K Beauty-TIP : [헤어] 머릿결 좋아지는 방법
vlive.english: You don't usually brush your hair often in a day.

examples.korean: The house was built using salvaged materials. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 집은 화재[재난]에서 회수된 재료들로 지어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house was built using salvaged materials. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company has recalled all the faulty hairdryers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 회사는 잘못된 헤어드라이어를 모두 회수했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company has recalled all the faulty hairdryers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The business quickly repaid the initial outlay on advertising. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사업에서는 광고에 들인 초기 경비가 곧 회수되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The business quickly repaid the initial outlay on advertising. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We hope to recoup our initial investment in the first year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 첫 해에 초기 투자금을 회수하기를 바란다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We hope to recoup our initial investment in the first year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ship was buried, beyond retrieval, at the bottom of the sea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 배는 회수할 수 없을 정도로 바다 밑바닥에 처박혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
